# Security Policy

## Supported Version

> | **Legend** | **Description** |
> |:---:|:----|
> | L | **LTS:** This is long term supported. |
> | âœ” | **Yes:** This is supported. |
> | ğŸ‘ | **Partly:** This is partly supported due to this version(s) is deprecated by a newer version(s). |
> | âŒ | **No:** This is not supported due to this version(s) is too old. |
> | âš  | **Issue:** This is not supported due to this version(s) is confirmed contains bug(s) and/or issue(s). |

## Report Vulnerability

### Contact

Send an email to anyone who listed in here (click the link to obtain the email address).

- [hugoalh](https://github.com/hugoalh)

### Content

Please include these content(s) in the email!

#### Title

- Project index (mostly start with `hugoalh-studio/`)

#### Body

- Your GitHub account username (e.g.: `@xxxx`)
- Affected version(s) (must be a supported version(s))
- Affected file(s)
- Issue(s) to cause this security issue
- *\[Optional\]* Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVE) Identifier (ID)
- *\[Optional\]* Reference of this security issue
